channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 英国与经纪商就帮助向散户投资者出售国家银行在 NatWest 的股份展开会谈
item.description:
The UK has opened talks with brokers about helping to sell the state’s shares in NatWest to retail investors https://t.co/nodsGl55nQ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚四个州正遭受热浪侵袭，当局正在与该国人口众多的东南部地区的一场大火作斗争。
item.description:
Heat waves are bearing down on four Australian states, as authorities battle a blaze in the nation’s populous southeast https://t.co/oxBzajGXQ8

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 全球最大的几家私人信贷公司认为，2024 年亚太地区的贷款将进一步增长，并将目光投向更优质的借款人，而不是不良案例
item.description:
Some of the world’s biggest private credit firms see a further increase in Asia-Pacific lending in 2024 and are training their sights on higher-quality borrowers rather than on distressed cases https://t.co/7RdTSR9yG5

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯财富基金通过出售伊斯兰债券筹集到 20 亿美元，这是该基金今年第二次进军债务市场
item.description:
Saudi Arabia’s wealth fund raises $2 billion from the sale of Islamic bonds, its second foray into the debt market this year https://t.co/StdHVkpYeq

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 以下是伦敦金融城及其他地区的最新新闻和见解

Here's the latest news and insights from the City of London and beyond https://t.co/91RQlEFnf5

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 德国环境署负责人表示，除非政治家们采取更多措施来缓解碳价格上涨对低收入家庭的影响，否则欧盟的气候议程有可能遭到广泛反弹。
item.description:
The EU is at risk of widespread backlash against its climate agenda unless politicians do more to blunt the effects of rising carbon prices on low-income households, the head of Germany’s Environment Agency says https://t.co/ZxjLeQunsG

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 消息人士称，中国监管机构正在采取措施逐步缩小一种流行的量化交易策略的规模，该策略本月曾引发中国股市动荡
item.description:
Chinese regulators are taking steps to gradually shrink the size of a popular quantitative trading strategy that contributed to turmoil in the nation’s stock market this month, sources say https://t.co/CDjq8hwiAe

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 最新：瑞士电信正在就以 80 亿欧元收购沃达丰意大利业务进行高级排他性谈判
item.description:
LATEST: Swisscom is in advanced exclusive talks to acquire Vodafone's Italian business for €8 billion https://t.co/ISZLNE3wEy

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 由于政府取消了令房地产市场降温的措施，香港居民、非本地购房者和房地产开发商将从该市的年度财政预算中获益。
item.description:
Hong Kong’s residents, non-local homebuyers and property developers are set to benefit from the city’s annual budget, as the government scraps measures that had cooled the housing market. https://t.co/za8m2gTcG5

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: Just Eat 表示，今年的盈利将好于分析师的预期，因为这家荷兰食品配送服务公司专注于削减成本，从而提高了盈利能力。
item.description:
Just Eat says its earnings this year will be better than analysts expect as the Dutch food delivery service’s focus on cost-cutting boosts its profitability https://t.co/QFqFLCHpYD

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 联合国官员警告说，加沙地带每四人中就有一人 "离 "饥荒 "只有一步之遥"。
item.description:
One in four people in the Gaza Strip are `one step away' from experiencing famine, United Nations officials warn https://t.co/B6hd0NyxE8

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 泰国总理萨维辛（Srettha Thavisin）正采取措施增加国家开支和公共投资，以促进东南亚第二大经济体的增长。
item.description:
Prime Minister Srettha Thavisin is taking steps to ramp up state spending and public investment to prop up growth in Southeast Asia’s second-largest economy https://t.co/rynJtE7C02

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 针对违约开发商碧桂园的清盘申请凸显了秘密民间借贷给陷入困境的中国房地产公司带来的风险
item.description:
A winding-up petition against defaulted developer Country Garden is highlighting the risks posed by secretive private loans on distressed Chinese property firms https://t.co/SpifztZzyT

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

Five things you need to know to start your day in Europe https://t.co/7R5CNasN0k

item.title: Intenseye利用计算机视觉和基因人工智能为喜力啤酒、太古可口可乐等客户标记并帮助修复数百万个安全隐患。
item.description:
AI startup for workplace safety has raised $46M from Lightspeed Venture, Insight Partners & others.
Intenseye uses computer vision & gen AI to flag, help fix millions of safety hazards for clients like Heineken, Swire Coca-Cola@business @technology https://t.co/F51OnZKa4c#AI pic.twitter.com/OmPbYwTv1e

— Saritha Rai (@SarithaRai) February 28, 2024

item.title: 这家初创公司利用人工智能和传感器系统绘制地下地图，客户包括洛杉矶地铁和 PG&E。Exodigo 已完成 1.05 亿美元的 A 轮融资，投资方包括 Greenfield Partners、Zeev Ventures、SquarePeg 等@business @technology #AI
item.description:
This startup uses AI and sensor systems to map the underground, with customers such as LA Metro and PG&E.
Exodigo has raised a $105M Series A round from Greenfield Partners, Zeev Ventures, SquarePeg, and others@business @technology https://t.co/MVZsqoJjUI#AI pic.twitter.com/S4MNS1TVv2

— Saritha Rai (@SarithaRai) February 28, 2024

item.title: 瞻博网络酒店集团在孟买首次公开募股（IPO）融资 2.17 亿美元，创下孟买酒店开发商和运营商融资规模之最。
item.description:
Juniper Hotels advances in Mumbai after an IPO that raised $217 million, the largest on record by a hotel developer and operator in the country https://t.co/XDp4Tr8ch5

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 新消息：长期以来，中央银行一直坚守自己的独立性，不受政客影响。但现在，它们正在涉足政治。这是一个冒险的举动
item.description:
NEW: Central banks have long guarded their independence from politicians. But now they are wading into politics. And that’s a risky move https://t.co/QfINj3wIDe

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: FTX 联合创始人山姆-班克曼-弗里德（Sam Bankman-Fried）的律师告诉联邦法官，他因策划欺诈案导致加密货币交易所倒闭而应服刑不超过 6 年半。
item.description:
FTX co-founder Sam Bankman-Fried should serve no more than 6 1/2 years in prison for orchestrating the fraud that brought down the cryptocurrency exchange, his lawyers tell a federal judge https://t.co/yAEcZubjHo

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 香港将把最高收入者的税率提高至 16
item.description:
Hong Kong will raise the tax rate for its highest earners to 16% https://t.co/WrKT9JIj6Z

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 秘书处经济？@Johnauthers 说，美联储利率决定与对实际经济的影响之间的滞后是前所未有的。降息的紧迫性不大
item.description:
A Secretariat economy? The lag between Fed rate decisions and impact on the actual economy has been like no other, says @johnauthers. There's little urgency to cut rates https://t.co/r3WxLJqZLj

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 阿达尼集团在新加坡与投资者会面，这是该集团自一年前经受住卖空者兴登堡（Hindenburg）造成的溃败后首次推销海外债券。
item.description:
Adani Group met with investors in Singapore, marketing an overseas bond for the first time since weathering the rout caused by shortseller Hindenburg a year ago https://t.co/U1zH7TX6j2

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 1.4 亿美元豪赌伦敦一块豪华地皮，结果事与愿违，这块地皮以大幅折扣易手
item.description:
A $140 million bet on a luxury London plot of land has turned sour, with the property changing hands at a steep discount https://t.co/S2uwWlLren

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 达拉在印度打板球。 Uber 公司的达拉-科斯罗萨西（Dara Khosrowshahi）在与印度同事和 Uber 司机的比赛中打出一个四分球，然后出局。科技大佬纳德拉、皮查伊等人能否将板球带入美国？
item.description:
Dara played cricket in India. Can cricket go to America?
Dara Khosrowshahi of Uber hit a four, then got out in match with India colleagues & Uber drivers. Can tech honchos Nadella, Pichai et al take cricket to the US in a big way?@business @technology https://t.co/cFLZvJSdbo pic.twitter.com/ca1qusjPom

— Saritha Rai (@SarithaRai) February 28, 2024

item.title: 在所有欧洲主要经济体中，英国的 "脆弱企业 "比例最高，这也表明英国首相苏纳克在努力促进经济增长的过程中面临着重重困难。
item.description:
The UK has the highest proportion of “fragile firms” out of all major European economies, another sign of the headwinds facing Prime Minister Rishi Sunak as he attempts to boost growth https://t.co/MGCkxBReDs

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 长期以来，中央银行一直坚守自己的独立性，不受政客影响。但现在，它们正在涉足政治。这是一个冒险的举动
item.description:
Central banks have long guarded their independence from politicians. But now they are wading into politics. And that’s a risky move https://t.co/oWMmUyp6S5

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 上个月，M&G 投资管理公司旗下的一只宏观基金趁中国股市大幅下挫之际，大举买入中国股票，从而进一步降低了估值。
item.description:
A macro fund of M&G Investment Management loaded up on Chinese stocks last month, taking advantage of the heavy selloff, which further cheapened valuations https://t.co/yxwDhauqT1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 市场定价逼近美联储点阵图，债券面临空头回补风险
item.description:
Short Cover Risk Seen in Bonds as Market Pricing Nears Fed Dots https://t.co/TgP1njIX35

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 28, 2024

item.title: 碧桂园债务危机震动中国金融市场，首次在香港接受清盘呈请
item.description:
Country Garden, whose debt crunch shook China’s financial markets, receives a wind-up petition in Hong Kong for the first time https://t.co/S3OvOcRK8Y pic.twitter.com/bq4iZJpKAn

— Bloomberg TV (@BloombergTV) February 28, 2024
